title: How Much Should I Spend on a Car? (Hour 3)
description:
Take our Audience Survey & Enter to Win a $500 Visa Gift Card: Click here to take the survey

Dr. John Delony & George Kamel discuss:

How much to spend on a car,

Being sued by a debt collector,

Cashing out retirement,

Saving or investing income.


Want a plan for your money? Find out where to start: https://bit.ly/3nInETX
Listen to all The Ramsey Network podcasts: https://bit.ly/3GxiXm6

Learn more about your ad choices. https://www.megaphone.fm/adchoices
